description:
Phantom Thief Zoobles: Chevy and Panky were both reading their favorite comics one day until a flash of thunder slightly scared them. They then saw thief named Mato, a tomato flavored bird zooble who is notorious on stealing junk as she flees. Coron also noticed the incident and they were getting a lot confused. As the day passes, everyone in Candy Land is relying on him on disposing junk, until she became angry and decides to kidnap Panky.
Welcome to Kumampa`s Happitat!: Kumampa invites Chevy and her friends to go to his Happitat to have a Karaoke party. However the only problem is how to get there, being his only home is located above the sky. So the consulted their pilot friend and inventor Winny, an Apple Cinnamon Flavored reindeer zooble. But getting there is probably the least of their worries.

titles.title: Kaitou Zoobles / Yousoku, Kumampa no Happitat e!
Phantom Thief Zoobles / Welcome to Kumampa`s Happitat!
怪盗ズーブルズ / ようこそ, クマンパのハピタットへ!
